DescriptionData.Title: Wild Faces - Nick & Brian Wolfe
DescriptionData.Description:
The founders of Wolfe Brothers, Nick and Brian Wolfe, have written an incredible face painting book, "Wild Faces" by Nick and Brian Wolfe. It features many creative and unique full-face designs, each with full color, step by step instructional photographs.
This book is for the more experienced face painter. No instructions are included--you need to know the basics of face painting. "Wild Faces" shows more advanced painters how to walk on the wild side and expand their artistic horizons with brilliant wild animal face paint designs. "Wild Faces" includes the following face painting designs: mandrill, bull/cow, piglet, horse, husky dog, elephant, lion, teddy bear, shark, squirrel, tree frog, sea horse, parrot /macaw, rooster, sea turtle, tiger beetle, komodo dragon. Pamphlet size, 30-page, photo paperback.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 30 pages of wild animal designs for face painting
Full color photograhs show each face painting design
This is a book for the more experienced face painter Directions are not included
Expand your face painting portfolio with madrills, monkeys, sea horses, bulls and more
